Title: Unsung Hero
Produced by:
Justin Tolley 
 Josh Walsh 
 Luke Smallbone
Starring:
Joel Smallbone 
 Daisy Betts 
 Kirrilee Berger 
 Jonathan Jackson 
 Candace Cameron Bure
Production companies: Kingdom Story Company Candy Rock Entertainment
Plot: In 1991, the Smallbone family moves from Australia to Nashville, Tennessee.
Cast: Kirrilee Berger as Rebecca St. James
Candace Cameron Bure as Kay Albright
Diesel La Torraca as Joel Smallbone
Production: On 30 November 2022, Joel and Luke Smallbone announced via social media that they had made a film with their brother Ben about their mother, although they did not announce a release date. The film is scheduled to release on 26 April 2024 by Lionsgate and produced by Kingdom Story Company.

The film is directed by Joel Smallbone, making his directorial debut. The script for "Unsung Hero" is co-authored by Joel Smallbone and Richard Ramsey, weaving a narrative around the real-life experiences of the Smallbone family. The movie features Smallbone stepping into the role of his father, David Smallbone, and Daisy Betts portraying Helen Smallbone, the family matriarch. The cast also includes Jonathan Jackson, Candace Cameron Bure, Kirrilee Berger, Lucas Black, Terry O'Quinn, and Hillary Scott. The production team comprises producers Justin Tolley, Josh Walsh, and Luke Smallbone.
The trailer was released on 13 November 2023.
